mainObjective: Discover the fate of the missing gnome kings and resolve the troubles in Gnomengarde

plotPoints.title: Entering Gnomengarde
plotPoints.description: Discover and enter the hidden entrance to Gnomengarde

plotPoints.title: Learning of the Missing Kings
plotPoints.description: Meet the Gnome Greeter and learn about the disappearance of the gnome kings

plotPoints.title: Investigating the Workshop
plotPoints.description: Explore the Inventor's Workshop for clues about the kings' disappearance

plotPoints.title: Gathering Information
plotPoints.description: Talk to gnome residents and search for personal items of the missing kings

plotPoints.title: Uncovering a Malfunction
plotPoints.description: Discover a malfunctioning device in the Testing Chamber causing trouble

plotPoints.title: The Feast Incident
plotPoints.description: Investigate a strange occurrence during a gnomish feast

plotPoints.title: Retrieving a Crucial Item
plotPoints.description: Enter the vault to retrieve a specific item needed to resolve the situation

plotPoints.title: Confronting the Truth
plotPoints.description: Use the retrieved item to reveal the truth about the kings' disappearance in the Throne Room

plotPoints.title: Rescuing the Kings
plotPoints.description: Save the gnome kings from their predicament

plotPoints.title: Pursuing the Culprit
plotPoints.description: Chase after the responsible party through the Secret Exit

plotPoints.title: Restoring Gnomengarde
plotPoints.description: Help restore order to Gnomengarde and deal with any remaining threats

sideQuests.title: The Dragon-Repelling Device
sideQuests.description: Help complete and test a device to repel Cryovain

sideQuests.title: Gnomish Culinary Challenge
sideQuests.description: Participate in a unique gnomish cooking competition
